DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of a short-term emotional stimulation on the mood of healthy persons.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Emotional Stimulation on the Stress Levels of Healthy Persons
DOC.detailed_description: The trial assesses the effects of a emotion-centered stimulation on the mood of healthy persons. The outcomes will be evaluated with standard questionnaires.
DOC.criteria: Age 18 to 45 Ability to speak German Physical or psychiatric disorders Consume of drugs or alcohol 24 previous to the test
